name: Tap The Fruit!
description:
Tap The Fruit, is a recent mobile game made by HenryD3bby, he is posting this here, because he can't afford $25 for a google developer account.

Tap The Fruit, is a recent mobile game made by HenryD3bby which consists in tapping fruit and eviting toothbrushes,  if the fruits fall at the bottom of the screen, where spikes are present, you lose. Every 100 points the color of the background changes. How far can you get? Thats up to you.
